options: ['it is interesting to play in a film', "a movie star's life is boring", "Lisa's life is different", 'Lisa is not a happy girl']
questions: According to  the passage, most people think   _  .
article: Lisa is a successful movie star. She plays in a lot of good movies. Many people are her fans   and like her very much. Most people think a star's life is different  . But Lisa doesn't think so. She says, "I am only an ordinary   girl. I like T-shirts and jeans like many girls. I like Chinese action movies best. I am a fan of many Chinese action stars. I like to go to the market  . People can not often recognize   me in the market. It is interesting."
